comment-dependencies.@babel/cli: improved version of babel-cli. Used for transpilation by babel.
comment-dependencies.nodemon: used to constantly watch for file change
comment-dependencies.npm-run-all: Some commands not run on terminals like windows powershell this makes sure they run properly
comment-dependencies.rimraf: for clearing the dist-server folder before reload.

comment-scripts.start: It is set default to npm run prod as it is used by many depolyment environments like AWS, Heroku.
comment-scripts.clean: cleans the dist-server folder for re-transpilation.
comment-scripts.transpile: runs babel to put the transpiled code to dist-server folder.
comment-scripts.server: runs the transpiled www.js from dist-server folder.
comment-scripts.dev: sets the development environment to development and builds and runs server.
comment-scripts.prod: sets the production environment to development and builds and runs server.
comment-scripts.watch:dev: To start development server with nodemon to watch for file changes.
